ygData.subject: Re: Rex's Story
ygData.msgSnippet: ... She laughs at herself. I m so sorry. I wasn t paying attention to where I stepped. She laughed as she was on the floor. I was so busy thinking about you

::Battera::

She laughs at herself. "I'm so sorry. I wasn't paying attention to 
where I stepped." She laughed as she was on the floor. "I was so busy 
thinking about you that I tripped." She laughed. "I'm sorry. Are you 
OK?"  She got up and looked at him.  She smiled, "I'm truely sorry." 
She felt so foolish about the whole thing that she couldn't help but 
chuckle at herself.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex sighs at her words, not slowing down. People have tried to help 
him in 
> the past, but nothing had worked. He was still, and always would 
be, filled 
> with hatred for the Predacons, for what they had done.
> 
> "No, it's all-AHH!" Rex loses his balance as Battera falls on him, 
his gun 
> flying out of his hand and sliding across the floor. He momentarily 
wonders 
> wether that was an accident or an attack, finally deciding to be 
cautious.
> 
> With a quick motion, he rolls away from her, jumping to his feet 
with a 
> pistol in his hand. "What was the meaning of that?!"
